a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Urban and rural population projected to 2050, World, 1500 to 2050
Total urban and rural population, given as estimates to 2016, and UN projections to 2050. Projections are based on
the UN World Urbanization Prospects and its median fertility scenario.
Source: OWID based on UN World Urbanization Prospects 2018 and historical sources (see Sources)
